reviewText: I was very pleased with the tape. My only wish is that it could have been a DVD.The movie itself is a classic.  I am a fan of Lauren Hewett(Ocean Girl) and was pleasantly surprised to see a very young Emily Browning (about 8 or 9 years old).  The story is set in scenic settings in Australia. It is a story about a teenage girl's (Hewett) adaption to a new family in a rustic setting following her mother's death. Her mother had been well to do and a stage star.  Her new family lives a simple life with not much in the way of money. I enjoyed this movie which was originally a made for a TV Hallmark Hall of Fame presentation.
Title: N/A
